channel.title: Comments on: Featured ED & SD Courses for Summer 2014

item.title: By: Sam Pierce
item.dc:creator: Sam Pierce
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/featured-courses-2014/#comment-879">Irene Huang</a>.
You can apply for both, but you would only be admitted to one or the other.
If you've attended the Elementary Division in the past, you are eligible to apply for a small number of Secondary Division courses as a returning 6th grader. Fill out a Secondary Division application. You can include Elementary Division 6th-grade course selections on that same application, if desired.
See the bottom of the page at /about/ed/catalog/sixth/ for more.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Irene Huang.

You can apply for both, but you would only be admitted to one or the other.

If you’ve attended the Elementary Division in the past, you are eligible to apply for a small number of Secondary Division courses as a returning 6th grader. Fill out a Secondary Division application. You can include Elementary Division 6th-grade course selections on that same application, if desired.

See the bottom of the page at /about/ed/catalog/sixth/ for more.

item.title: By: Irene Huang
item.dc:creator: Irene Huang
item.description: I am completing sixth grade in June 2014, so does that mean I can apply for elementary division and secondary division at the same time, or can I only apply for one?
item.content:encoded: I am completing sixth grade in June 2014, so does that mean I can apply for elementary division and secondary division at the same time, or can I only apply for one?
